data.name: Adventure Light Demo
data.detailed_description: Adventure Light is a stylized puzzle action-adventure game about a young boy named Steve who's trying to find his lost friend. It's a very immersive and atmospheric side scroller full of fascinating puzzles. Have a great time solving puzzles and searching for all hidden objects along the way.
data.about_the_game: Adventure Light is a stylized puzzle action-adventure game about a young boy named Steve who's trying to find his lost friend. It's a very immersive and atmospheric side scroller full of fascinating puzzles. Have a great time solving puzzles and searching for all hidden objects along the way.
data.short_description: Adventure Light is a stylized puzzle action-adventure game about a young boy named Steve who's trying to find his lost friend. It's a very immersive and atmospheric side scroller full of fascinating puzzles. Have a great time solving puzzles and searching for all hidden objects along the way.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260, ATI Radeon 4870 HD, or equivalent card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OS X 10.9
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: MacBook, MacBook Pro or iMac 2010 or later
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
